content: I was reading this paper in the morning https://philarchive.org/archive/GAROTN
How to understand William Lawvere's comment that Grassmann's work being a precursor to category theory?
3 messages were moved here from #learning: questions > Understanding Yoneda lemma by Matteo Capucci (he/him).
@Peiyuan Zhu since you changed topic, I started a new topic (for the future: is the button on the bottom right of the screen)
I see so I wonâ€™t need to worry about creating too much complexity for the stream

The paper you pointed to cites a paper by Lawvere called "Grassman's dialectics and category theory". I don't know that the best way to understand Lawvere's thoughts is to read his writing, but it's certainly a place to start. You can find Lawvere's collected works here: https://github.com/mattearnshaw/lawvere.
